1: dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste <mistake>pad+ma'i</mistake> <mistake>'dab</mistake> ma rgyas pa'i <mistake>sbyan// sangs</mistake> rgyas se <mistake>ga'i</mistake> <mistake>khri</mistake> la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis <mistake>btu</mistake> la rgyal po zla ba bzang po <mistake>yis//mgo</mistake> bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag
2: <mistake>pa'i</mistake> <mistake>pad+ma</mistake> sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa <mistake>ni /nal</mistake> 'byor dpal ldan dus <mistake>'kho</mistake> <mistake>raga</mistake> phreng ldan <mistake>pa'ia</mistake> <mistake>'dus</mistake> la ste mi rnams dgol ba'i <mistake>ru</mistake> <mistake>'o/ 4stong</mistake> pa <mistake>ye</mistake> shes kyang ste thig le
3: mchog mchog <mistake>rgo</mistake> rje 'dzin pa <mistake>sngs</mistake> rgyas lha dang <mistake>lha</mistake> min <mistake>yang//phyi</mistake> dang <mistake>zus</mistake> dang gzhan la <mistake>yang</mistake> ste rang bzhin <mistake>na mlas</mistake> la <mistake>skyers</mistake> <mistake>pha nyi</mistake> <mistake>snu+nga</mistake> <mistake>pa ni</mistake> <mistake>badag</mistake> nyid <mistake>dang//lus</mistake> la <mistake>ma</mistake> tshogs tshang dang srid <mistake>khast/</mistake>
4: gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi <mistake>pongs</mistake> sbyod <mistake>dang// dkyil</mistake> 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di <mistake>di</mistake> <mistake>gyang</mistake> dag <mistake>bshad</mistake> du <mistake>gsol//zla</mistake> ba bzang po khyod la bdag <mistake>mu</mistake> <mistake>gng</mistake>
5: zhig khyod kyis <mistake>ris</mistake> pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams <mistake>dang//mi</mistake> dang <mistake>snin</mistake> po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams <mistake>dag</mistake> gis shes pa min pas <mistake>so //mya</mistake> <mistake>dan</mistake> <mistake>'das pa</mistake> la <mistake>sogs</mistake> <mistake>'i din</mistake>
6: ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag <mistake>ni //lus</mistake> dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis mi yi <mistake>ba dag</mistake> po bzang po <mistake>nyon//dus</mistake> kyis <mistake>stond</mistake> pa rnams
7: las rlung dang 'bar byed <mistake>chud</mistake> <mistake>ng</mistake> 'dzin ma gling dang <mistake>ro</mistake> <mistake>bo rgya</mistake> mtsho <mistake>dang//srgyu</mistake> skar dang <mistake>ni</mistake> <mistake>nyi zla</mistake> <mistake>ska ra</mistake> ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang <mistake>'byang</mistake> <mistake>bo</mistake> klu rnams <mistake>dang//dud</mistake> <mistake>'gro</mistake> skye gnas rnam <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>bzhidng</mistake> sna tshogs
8: sa dang 'og <mistake>tu</mistake> mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba <mistake>yang//stong</mistake> pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byur ste chu la lan <mistake>tsha</mistake> dang ni sgo ra'i dbus su sgong <mistake>sktes</mistake> <mistake>bzhin// lus</mistake> <mistake>dadg</mistake> ye shes <mistake>nama</mistake> mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang
